        public void getUserData(OnTaskCompleteListener listener)
        Get the user data. Sample return : "data": { "id": "1574083", "username": "snoopdogg", "full_name": "Snoop Dogg", "profile_picture": "http://distillery.s3.amazonaws.com/profiles/profile_1574083_75sq_1295469061.jpg", "bio": "This is my bio", "website": "http://snoopdogg.com", "counts": { "media": 1320, "follows": 420, "followed_by": 3410 }

      • getRelationships

        public void getRelationships(OnTaskCompleteListener listener,
                             java.lang.String otherUserId)
        Get information about a relationship to another user. Relationships are expressed using the following terms in the response: 1) outgoing_status: Your relationship to the user. Can be 'follows', 'requested', 'none'. 2) incoming_status: A user's relationship to you. Can be 'followed_by', 'requested_by', 'blocked_by_you', 'none'.
        Parameters:
        listener -
        otherUserId - The other userId to compare against

      • updateRelationships

        Update a relationship by taking an action (See actions for more info)
